message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking $150 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for offering the product. I believe I can offer you $120 for it.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm looking for something closer to $140. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I am willing to pay $130 for the product.
